conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway/isometric-style model with visible wall height/thickness, floor plane separation, and exposed interior volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Convincing 3D massing with correct wall corner geometry, clear floor/wall separation, angled elevated view, and clean roof cutaway; minor simplification of some wall tops/openings.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall layout matches (living/dining left, kitchen core, two bedrooms right, bath+WC central, separate garage). Balcony/patio condition is not clearly modeled and some opening placements (windows/doors) appear simplified relative to the plan.

interior_elements.notes: Living furniture, dining table, kitchen counters, bedroom bed, and bath/WC fixtures are present and generally placed in correct rooms. Bedroom 2 appears largely unfurnished (acceptable but reduces completeness).

visual_clarity.notes: Clean, readable geometry and uncluttered background; lighting is sufficient. Some openings lack detail, slightly reducing readability of door/window fidelity.

detected_errors.description: Balcony shown on the 2D plan is not clearly represented as a balcony space in the 3D model (appears as windows/opening without an explicit balcony platform/edge).
Door/window positions and sizes appear simplified; not all openings from the 2D plan are clearly matched in the 3D render.
Second bedroom lacks major furniture, reducing room identity verification.

summary: A true 3D cutaway conversion with strong overall layout fidelity, but with simplified/unclear balcony and some door/window mismatches.
